org.happy.artist.rmdmia.rcsm.provider
Interface CommunicationReceiverInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
TCPROSPublisherCommunicator, TCPROSServiceCommunicator, TCPROSSubscriberCommunicator, UDPReceiver, UDPROSCommunicator
public interface CommunicationReceiverInterface

A protocol independent interface for a provider Receiver to receive data through the RCSM.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getHostName()
          Return the hostname.
 MessageHandlerInterface getMessageHandlerInterface()
          Return the MessageHandlerInterface.
 int getReceivePort()
          Return the currently registered socket port.
 boolean isRunning()
          Return boolean is connected on socket.
 void recycle()
          Recycle this class for use in a Cache Pool.
 void shutdown()
          Shutdown this CommunicationReceiverInterface implementation.
 void start()
          Start the receiver, and connect to the remote socket.
 void stop()
          Stop the associated provider control identifier Receiver thread from running, and shutdown the socket.
 

Method Detail

shutdown

void shutdown()
Shutdown this CommunicationReceiverInterface implementation. Only call this method on shutdown. Cannot be reinitialized.

void recycle()
Recycle this class for use in a Cache Pool.

Return boolean is connected on socket.

boolean Is connected.

Returns:
int receiver port. -1 no port.

Stop the associated provider control identifier Receiver thread from running, and shutdown the socket.
